description:
September 20, 2018 / Colin reports on the five states that lack hate crimes laws.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by Boll & Branch and VistaPrint.

BollandBranch.com use promo code UNDISCLOSED for $50 off your first set of sheets.

Vistaprint.com use code UNDISCLOSED.
